what_you_do: Maurice Thibodeau is the founder of Illumination Experiences, offering personal development coaching, transformational retreats, and the Life Inventory Assessment tool to help people live with purpose.
who_you_serve: Coaches and individuals seeking personal transformation and purposeful living.
social_proof: ICF-accredited certification program (28 credits); featured on Welcome To The Winners Circle podcast (episode 40); spoke at leadership summits, universities, corporations, and festivals.
signature_programs: Life Inventory Assessment (LIA), LIA Coach Certification, Ignite Retreats, I Am Festival (co-founder)
business_focus: Helping individuals and coaches achieve personal transformation and live purposefully through assessments, retreats, and certifications.
service_provided: life coaching, transformational retreats, Life Inventory Assessment, ICF-accredited coach certification, workshops, speaking
